---
title: "Data and Instructions"
---

### **Data and instructions**

\- Download the set of curated data at [link.](http://bioconductor.org/packages/release/data/experiment/html/SimBenchData.html) Details about the data can be found in the package and can also be browsed under the shiny tab "More".

\- Run your own method.

\- Evaluate the simulated data against the real data across the set of criteria we have curated at [link.](https://github.com/SydneyBioX/SimBench)

\- Upload the result to the panel Submit your data.
